body.name: Masthome Microfiber Mop for Floor Cleaning, Self Wringing Flat Mop with 6 Washable Mop Pads, Hands Free Cleaning Mop with Stainless Steel Handle for Hardwood Laminate Tile Vinyl

asinVariationValues.variationValue: Large Surface Mop Pads Pack of 3
Large Microfiber Mop with 5 Mop Refills

deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 15 hrs 10 mins
features: Hand Free Self Cleaning Mop - You can clean and wring the mop without the need for an additional wringing bucket. Just pull the handle to slide it over the mop head to remove hair and dirt on the mop pad and wring out the water. Keep your hands away from dirt.

Clean Every Corner - The 360 degree rotatable mop head can flexibly bypass furniture and table corners and go deep into the bottom of beds, cabinets and TV cabinets. The extra wide mop head has a larger coverage, which can save cleaning time and labor. Take good care of every gaps of your floor.

Washable Mop Pads - Comes with 6 microfiber mop pad refills in total. Premium mop pads have good water absorption and can quickly absorb oil, beverage and seasoning stains. Good at picking up hair, dust, debris and small particles. Mop pads are machine washable and reusable, they can save you a lot of money.

Stainless Steel Long Handle - The handle of this mop can be extended to 52 inches, generally meeting the needs of all kinds of people. You don't have to bend down, keep upright and enjoy a relaxed and pleasant cleaning work. High quality stainless steel material is not easy to bend and deform, making the overall weight of the mop lighter.

Suitable for all kinds of floors - our microfiber dust mop will not scratch the floors, is safe for all floor surfaces, such as wood, laminate, tiles, marble, ceramic floors, composite floors and even ceilings. If there is any problem with the item, you can contact us through Amazon and we will provide you with a solution as soon as possible.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Color: Gray + Red Material: PP + Stainless Steel + Microfiber Size: Product size: 35.5 x 10.5 x 132 cm. Total length of handle: 123 cm Package size: 44*13*7.5 cm. Package include:6 x microfiber cleaning cloth 1 broom base 2 x stainless steel pole

Masthome 360 Hands Free Wash Microfiber Floor Mop With a 52-inch long handle, this mop generally caters to all types of people. You don't have to bend over, just stay upright and enjoy a relaxing clean.

Hand Free Self Wringing Mop Slide the handle up and down to wring out the mop and remove dirt from the pad. Keep your hands clean and do not touch the dirty mop pad. Automatic Rebound When rotated to 30°, the mop head will automatically spring back for easy wringing and storage. Easy to Store The compact design allows vertical storage. It can also be hung for storage. Washable and Reusable Mop Pad These easy-to-replace microfiber mop pads are machine washable and can be reused hundreds of times, saving you money.
Suitable for different types of floors

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 23, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love, love, love
reviews.reviewText: I have been through countless brooms and mops of different sizes, brands, types… Swiffers, O’Cedars, wring out mops, plain Jane old fashioned squeegee mops, plastic bristle brooms, straw brooms…. this one puts all of the rest to absolute shame.I have all faux wood flooring throughout my apartment and a short haired, 75 pound doggo that sheds incessantly, and many little messes made by the doggo’s super toddler. This thing is practically a miracle.In just one sweeping/dry mopping session the dog hair is nonexistent (which is a freaking magic trick or something), all of the fine dirt particles (and cracker crumbs and little things that were probably something are one point in time but have been chewed beyond recognition), dust particles…. it’s all gone in a once over.I have not yet used it as a wet mop. I do stop use my O’Cedar spray, microfiber mop to do sanitation and a wring out mop to take care of big spills.I was kicking myself in the rear and for spending $30 on a broom. This is, quite literally, probably the best $30 I’ve ever wasted. I’ve noticed less dust particles flying around (wooden furniture is not in need of a deep dusting right after I sweep) and my allergies have even improved after starting to use this dust mop/broom. I’m sold. It came with 5 microfiber cloths (instead of the three) but I haven’t even had to use another one because the scraper that comes with it (the little grey plastic piece with teeth that attaches to the pole) knocks off all of the excess dog hair and dust like a charm.I’ve used it daily since it arrived a couple of weeks ago. So, I’m not sure how durable it is going to turn out to be with Velcro being what attaches the cloth to the pole… but surely the Velcro will stay in place for a good while… and if not, replacing Velcro isn’t a difficult task and would be well worth it.Def won’t throw the microfiber in the drier. Will be air dried all the way.Every time I use this contraption, I’m more and more impressed. Like, my floors actually FEEL clean after using this when walking around in bare feet… even with a doggo and a kiddo running around. Freaking amazing.Def has Swiffer and company beat, hands down. Very sturdy; seems durable; outrageous amount of money spent on a broom that was well worth it. I suspect it’s one that will last for years (fingers crossed, Hail Mary).

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Mop Ever!
reviews.reviewText: This mop is THE BEST! it's brilliant squeegee wringing system makes it the cleanest wringer on a mop! I just have to say try it!! It goes side ways flattens to go under most thi gs can do baseboards with ease clean walls windows I put it to the test!! It's got A++ from me! reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Plank floor cleaning
reviews.reviewText: The product was what I expected. Appears to be well made.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Do NOT buy this mop
reviews.reviewText: I never thought I would be writing a review for a mop but this one was such a waste of money. It worked beautifully the first time. But once I removed the pad to wash it, it absolutely would not work like it was supposed to. Not even with a new pad. The squeeze bar is supposed to glide over the pad to remove excess water. Like I said, beautiful the first time. Thereafter it just would not “glide” correctly over the pad. It kept getting caught and if forced, it would spit and splash the water along with moving the pad. I have tried everything I can think of and it is just so frustratingly awful. I got so angry I just threw the stupid thing and then of course it really broke!!! DO NOT BUY THIS MOP!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Cleans Well....If Only The Handle Would Assemble Properly
reviews.reviewText: The middle section of the handle will not screw in properly.....it keeps turning and never catches. So, it makes it pretty difficult to use. I am pleased, though, with the size of the cleaning pads, their quality, and that it comes with one already on the mop head and four extras! If I can figure out how to keep the middle section of the handle from constantly popping out, I know I'll love mopping with it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Hardest part is putting on the pads on the tabs correctly
Great product, works really well on my slate floors and I can even get under my low couch

Wide head helps go over large areas wuickly
